production.name: Sup
production.description: "Who's free to hang" PWA. One-tap broadcasting to your squad with push notifications, real-time map with midpoint calculation, and bar suggestions near the group.
highlights: Live updates via WebSockets with automatic polling fallback for reliability
Geographic database queries to calculate distances and parse location data
Calculates the geographic center point between all active users
Server-side push notifications with encrypted signing keys
Database-level access control ‚Äî users only see their own squad's data

production.name: MJ Growth Consulting
production.description: Marketing website for a Fortune 100 sales executive's growth advisory practice. Clean, minimal design with image carousel and contact form.
highlights: Swipe-enabled image carousel with touch gesture detection
Scroll-triggered fade-in animations using Intersection Observer
Dynamic schedule that auto-labels the next upcoming event
Contact form with real-time validation and API submission
Performance-optimized font loading that doesn't block page render

production.name: Horizon Alliance
production.description: Alliance hub for Last War: Survival Game. Features event schedules, battle strategies, leadership roster, and alliance lore with a tactical military aesthetic.
highlights: Live countdown timer that converts between user's timezone and game time
Structured data model for multi-phase battle plans with role assignments
Animated mobile menu with 3D transform transitions
Collapsible FAQ and lore sections with custom expand/collapse styling
Pulsing glow animations on event banners to draw attention

experimental.name: ATC Radar Game
experimental.description: Air Traffic Control radar simulation game. Vector arrivals to runways, sequence departures, and manage waypoints to keep the skies safe.
highlights: Frame-rate-independent game loop ‚Äî physics work the same at 30fps or 120fps
Aircraft with 6 flight states and realistic turn/climb behavior
Enforces real ATC separation rules in both horizontal and vertical dimensions
Animated radar sweep rendered with Canvas gradients

experimental.name: News Tracker
experimental.description: Real-time news aggregator tracking latest articles for Adobe, Coal Energy, and GLP-1s with smart ranking and auto-refresh.
highlights: Custom ranking algorithm that weighs article freshness and source credibility
Server-side proxy to keep API keys secure and bypass browser restrictions
Boolean search queries (AND/OR) for precise topic matching
15-minute auto-refresh with proper memory cleanup on unmount

experimental.name: New Year's Countdown 2026
experimental.description: Real-time countdown to New Year's Day with year progress tracker and particle visualization system.
highlights: Particle system where elements physically stack on top of each other
Scales from 0 to 4,500 particles proportional to year progress
Layered glass-blur effects with dynamic color-shifting glow
Choreographed entrance animations with staggered timing

experimental.name: Sports Scores
experimental.description: Live sports scores and game tracking across 17 leagues with intelligent ranking.
highlights: Fetches scores from 17 leagues simultaneously using parallel API calls
Ranks games by importance: playoff status, broadcast, team quality, and context
Caps games per league so no single sport dominates the feed
Shows today's games, or falls back to yesterday if nothing's on

experimental.name: Jackson Hole Snow Tracker
experimental.description: Real-time snow conditions dashboard with vintage split-flap display leaderboard and dynamic snowfall visualization.
highlights: Snowfall animation intensity scales with actual reported snow data
Vintage airport-style split-flap display with 3D flip animations
Scrapes 12 resort websites for live snow data with automatic error recovery
Custom-drawn charts (no charting library) with dynamic axis scaling
